name: Shakib Khan
review: I love the ease of driving, it is a very smooth experience. Plus, the technology that this vehicle possess, everyone that has been in my Audi had fallen in love with it as much as I have.

name: Rakib Khan
review: Rides so smooth and fast. Sometimes I don't even realize how fast I'm going. Just loving my new ride.

name: Mahtib Khan
review: Spectacular experience! Im in love with my Audi! Customer service was phenominal. Best car I've ever driven this far. It's a great family ride and I am thankful for my entire experience.

name: Nakib Khan
review: Smooth quiet ride, good handling, latest technology, good quality of everything the only complaint is about the emergency connection (I needed to contact the dealer and it seems to be a recognized problem)

name: Akib Khan
review: The exterior and interior styling and quality is exceptional. The the MMI touch screen is easy to use and intuitive. The car performance is outstanding.

name: Chakib Khan
review: Roomy and great safety features. The Audi Pre-Sense will let you know there's a potential hazard in front of you (a braking car) if you haven't put the brakes on already.
